blackbeard:Sharpening.NAME: Sharpening
blackbeard:Sharpening.DESCRIPTION: Give all your equipped Weapons + !M! attack.

blackbeard:Parrot.NAME: Parrot
blackbeard:Parrot.DESCRIPTION: The last card played each turn is played an additional time. This power does not stack. NL Ethereal.
blackbeard:Parrot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The last card played each turn is played an additional time. This power does not stack.

blackbeard:TheDrunkenSailor.NAME: The Drunken Sailor
blackbeard:TheDrunkenSailor.DESCRIPTION: Your potions are used an additional time.

blackbeard:SwordDance.NAME: Sword Dance
blackbeard:SwordDance.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! Attacks use all equipped Weapons.

blackbeard:CannonBarrage.NAME: Cannon Barrage
blackbeard:CannonBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Add X Cannonballs to your hand.
blackbeard:CannonBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X+1 Cannonballs to your hand.

blackbeard:GhostInTheRum.NAME: Ghost In The Rum
blackbeard:GhostInTheRum.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Lose !M! Resistance. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:GoldenStrike.NAME: Golden Strike
blackbeard:GoldenStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL 1.5% of Gold gained NL this run.
blackbeard:GoldenStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL !M! + 1.5% of Gold gained NL this run.

blackbeard:PowderKeg.NAME: Powder Keg
blackbeard:PowderKeg.DESCRIPTION: Equip a {A} / {D} Weapon. When it is destroyed, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

blackbeard:Scrap.NAME: Scrap
blackbeard:Scrap.DESCRIPTION: Destroy your rightmost Weapon to gain [R] [R].
blackbeard:Scrap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Destroy your rightmost Weapon to gain NL [R] [R] [R].

blackbeard:RemoveScurvy.NAME: Remove Scurvy
blackbeard:RemoveScurvy.DESCRIPTION: Heal 10% of your maximum HP. NL Remove all of your Debuffs. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:InfiniteBarrage.NAME: Infinite Barrage
blackbeard:InfiniteBarrage.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a Cannonball card to your hand.
blackbeard:InfiniteBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. At the start of each turn, add a Cannonball card to your hand.

blackbeard:SwordOfWisdom.NAME: Sword Of Wisdom
blackbeard:SwordOfWisdom.DESCRIPTION: Equip a !M! / {D} Weapon. Whenever you attack with this Weapon, draw a card.

blackbeard:SwordOfChaos.NAME: Sword Of Chaos
blackbeard:SwordOfChaos.DESCRIPTION: Equip a !M! / {D} Weapon. Whenever you attack with this Weapon, add a random card to your hand.

blackbeard:GoldenCannonball.NAME: Golden Cannonball
blackbeard:GoldenCannonball.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL 2% of Gold gained NL this run. Exhaust.
blackbeard:GoldenCannonball.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL !M! + 2% of Gold gained NL this run. Exhaust.

blackbeard:FinalBarrage.NAME: Final Barrage
blackbeard:FinalBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the amount of Cannonballs played this combat (every type of Cannonball counts).

blackbeard:JollyRoger.NAME: Jolly Roger
blackbeard:JollyRoger.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

blackbeard:CaptainsCabin.NAME: Captain's Cabin
blackbeard:CaptainsCabin.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! Cannonball to your hand.
blackbeard:CaptainsCabin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! Cannonballs to your hand.

blackbeard:GoldenDefend.NAME: Golden Defend
blackbeard:GoldenDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to NL 1.5% of Gold gained NL this run.
blackbeard:GoldenDefend.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to NL !M! + 1.5% of Gold gained NL this run.

blackbeard:Toast.NAME: Toast
blackbeard:Toast.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Resistance. NL At the start of your next turn, lose !M! Resistance. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:CatONineTails.NAME: Cat O' Nine Tails
blackbeard:CatONineTails.DESCRIPTION: Equip a !M! / {D} Weapon. After you attack with this Weapon, give it + 2 Attack.

blackbeard:Murder.NAME: Murder
blackbeard:Murder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage     NL to a Normal enemy. NL (Cannot be used on Elite or Boss). NL Ethereal.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have to target a Normal enemy!

blackbeard:TacticalRetreat.NAME: Tactical Retreat
blackbeard:TacticalRetreat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 more card next turn.

blackbeard:Dagger.NAME: Dagger
blackbeard:Dagger.DESCRIPTION: Equip a {A} / !M! Weapon. NL At the start of your turn, NL 1 Durability from Dagger is used to deal damage equal to its Attack to a random enemy.

blackbeard:PiratesWill.NAME: Pirate's Will
blackbeard:PiratesWill.DESCRIPTION: Remove all of your Debuffs. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:Eyepatch.NAME: Eyepatch
blackbeard:Eyepatch.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Weak. NL At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.
blackbeard:Eyepatch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Gain 3 Weak. NL At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.

blackbeard:Keelhauling.NAME: Keelhauling
blackbeard:Keelhauling.DESCRIPTION: Targeted enemy takes 8 damage at the start of their turn. NL Lasts for !M! turns.

blackbeard:BlindAttacks.NAME: Blind Attacks
blackbeard:BlindAttacks.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 3 times.

blackbeard:Boarding.NAME: Boarding
blackbeard:Boarding.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! cards.

blackbeard:AgileStrike.NAME: Agile Strike
blackbeard:AgileStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have equipped a Weapon this turn, reduce cost of NL this card to 0.

blackbeard:DangerousBlow.NAME: Dangerous Blow
blackbeard:DangerousBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At the end of your next turn, you take !M! damage.

blackbeard:VengefulSpirit.NAME: Vengeful Spirit
blackbeard:VengefulSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL At the start of the turn on which you are no longer Intangible, you take !M! damage. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:Revenge.NAME: Revenge
blackbeard:Revenge.DESCRIPTION: Deal 0 - !M! damage to ALL enemies, based on how many % of HP you are missing. NL Max damage at 1 HP.

blackbeard:GoldenRain.NAME: Golden Rain
blackbeard:GoldenRain.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL 2.5% of Gold gained NL this run to ALL enemies.
blackbeard:GoldenRain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL 3% of Gold gained NL this run to ALL enemies.

blackbeard:Sword.NAME: Sword
blackbeard:Sword.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Swords. NL Equip a !M! / {D} Weapon with an additional effect.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #rFire: Whenever you attack with this Weapon, deal #b3 damage to all enemies. NL #yWisdom: Whenever you attack with this Weapon, draw a card. NL #pChaos: Whenever you attack with this Weapon, add a random card to your hand.

blackbeard:BeatUp.NAME: Beat Up
blackbeard:BeatUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

blackbeard:ChaoticDefend.NAME: Chaotic Defend
blackbeard:ChaoticDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! random card to your hand.
blackbeard:ChaoticDefend.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! random cards to your hand.

blackbeard:SmithingHammer.NAME: Smithing Hammer
blackbeard:SmithingHammer.DESCRIPTION: Equip a {A} / !M! Weapon. After you attack with this Weapon and passively at the start of your turn using 1 durability, upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of the combat. Exhaust.

blackbeard:WeaponMastery.NAME: Weapon Mastery
blackbeard:WeaponMastery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Equip a Weapon, draw a card.

blackbeard:Salvager.NAME: Salvager
blackbeard:Salvager.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a Weapon is destroyed, gain [R].

blackbeard:Anchor.NAME: Anchor
blackbeard:Anchor.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.
blackbeard:Anchor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:BoostMorale.NAME: Boost Morale
blackbeard:BoostMorale.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [R]. NL Exhaust.
blackbeard:BoostMorale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [R] [R]. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:Recklessness.NAME: Recklessness
blackbeard:Recklessness.DESCRIPTION: Gain [R] [R]. NL At the start of your next turn, lose [R] [R].
blackbeard:Recklessness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [R] [R] [R]. NL At the start of your next turn, lose [R] [R].

blackbeard:DelayedPain.NAME: Delayed Pain
blackbeard:DelayedPain.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the end of your next turn, you take !M! damage.

blackbeard:ArmorUp.NAME: Armor Up
blackbeard:ArmorUp.DESCRIPTION: This turn, whenever you attack with a Weapon, gain !M! Block.

blackbeard:Intoxication.NAME: Intoxication
blackbeard:Intoxication.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Resistance. NL At the start of each turn, lose 1 Resistance.

blackbeard:CannonballSupply.NAME: Cannonball Supply
blackbeard:CannonballSupply.DESCRIPTION: Add 3 Cannonballs to your hand. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:BountyHunter.NAME: Bounty Hunter
blackbeard:BountyHunter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this kills a non-minion enemy, gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:GoldenGuillotine.NAME: Golden Guillotine
blackbeard:GoldenGuillotine.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL !M! percent of Gold gained this run.

blackbeard:DoubleBottom.NAME: Double Bottom
blackbeard:DoubleBottom.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn gain !B! Block.

blackbeard:Provisioning.NAME: Provisioning
blackbeard:Provisioning.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a random potion. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:TerrorOfTheSeas.NAME: Terror Of The Seas
blackbeard:TerrorOfTheSeas.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

blackbeard:RunForYourLife.NAME: Run For Your Life
blackbeard:RunForYourLife.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a Smoke Bomb Potion. Exhaust.

blackbeard:DoubleCannonball.NAME: Double Cannonball
blackbeard:DoubleCannonball.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Exhaust. NL Add a Cannonball to your hand.
blackbeard:DoubleCannonball.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Exhaust. NL Add an upgraded Cannonball to your hand.

blackbeard:SwordOfFire.NAME: Sword Of Fire
blackbeard:SwordOfFire.DESCRIPTION: Equip a !M! / {D} Weapon. Whenever you attack with this Weapon, deal 3 damage to all enemies.

blackbeard:CloakAndCannonball.NAME: Cloak And Cannonball
blackbeard:CloakAndCannonball.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL  Add a Cannonball to your hand.

blackbeard:UndeadForm.NAME: Undead Form
blackbeard:UndeadForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL At the start of the turn on which you are no longer Intangible, you take 30 damage.
